title: What Are IEEE Student Activities?
description: IEEE Student Activities empower university students to take part in technical, professional, and leadership opportunities through local student branches, technical workshops, conferences, competitions, and social impact events. By participating, students build networks, develop teamwork and management skills, and engage with the global IEEE community.

highlights.title: Student Branches
highlights.desc: Active IEEE communities at universities; learn, collaborate, and lead locally.

highlights.title: Technical Events & Workshops
highlights.desc: Expand technical knowledge and hands-on experience through STEM programs.

highlights.title: Competitions & Hackathons
highlights.desc: Solve challenges, develop solutions, and earn recognition.

highlights.title: Leadership & Teamwork
highlights.desc: Develop management skills, organize major events, and represent your peers.
